short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enables screen sharing in your SP Robotic Works Web application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows SP Robotic Works website users to share their desktop screens with the SP Robotic Works Tech Team as part of Live Support provided by SP Robotic Works through Online Robotic Courses at https://sproboticworks.com
